title: Fighting graves is like fighting a mini dark souls boss

replies.body:
Because you fed him?

Usually the answer when someone is complaining about X being OP.
Never said you cant kill a mini dark souls boss..

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VEF1TUUK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-16T23:23:09.912+0000)
>
> Because you fed him?
> 
> Usually the answer when someone is complaining about X being OP.

u dont have to feed graves in order for him to shit on you in every 1v1 possible.

every single 1v1.

i wish i was exxagerating.

I still haven't found out how to roll to avoid his autoattacks.
I can roll out of his skills, but then he just kills me with his autos.
What am I doing wrong?

im pretty sure u cant dodge his autoattacks, tho u can stay behind other ally units or structures to block it for u.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1iMezum87rU&list=PLvEkgn9uepVT7B1xjKnNte4mmgLzVFEjy&index=25

2:10~2:25

> [{quoted}](name=SAO T1 Yui,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VEF1TUUK,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-17T00:27:50.709+0000)
>
> im pretty sure u cant dodge his autoattacks, tho u can stay behind other ally units or structures to block it for u.
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1iMezum87rU&list=PLvEkgn9uepVT7B1xjKnNte4mmgLzVFEjy&index=25
> 
> 2:10~2:25

You can dodge them with blink, probably, anyway.

Buddy summons in 4 other phantoms to take down 1 boss.
Git Gud

I was talking about Graves tho

[insert overused cigar joke here]
oh XD nah the cigar would be his 2nd form lmaoo
